item.title: Dell Xps 15 9510
item.description: Setup Connect iwctl device list station <device> scan station <device> get-networks station <device connect <SSID> ping google.com Date and Time timedatectl set-ntp true timedatectl status Set timezone ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Europe/Brussels /etc/localtime Sync the hardware clock date hwclock --systohc Disk Format the disk with gdisk, creating 2 partitions: p1: 1GB / EFI p2: Rest / Linux Crypt Formatting Create the EFI Fs mkfs.fat -F 32 -n EFI /dev/nvme0n1p1 Crypt cryptsetup luksFormat /dev/nvme0n1p2 cryptsetup open /dev/nvme0n1p2 arch lsblk Btrfs mkfs.
